医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的生物标志物可以帮助识别有血管性痴呆风险的人痴呆症是一组具有相似症状的脑部疾病，例如记忆、语言、定向和行为问题。据瑞士阿尔茨海默病协会称，血管性痴呆通常发生在老年人中，影响 65 岁以上人群的 1% 至 4%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/New-biomarker-could-help-identify-people-at-risk-for-angio-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/New-biomarker-could-help-identify-people-at-risk-for-angio-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae431cca-1e8d-4234-9c61-f98834f6859b Mon, 04 Sep 2023 08:18:00 -0400 New biomarker could help identify people at risk for vascular dementia
研究人员开发工具来识别有药物伤害风险的患者昆士兰大学的一项研究合作将着眼于降低住院患者和出院回家患者因药物造成伤害的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Researchers-develop-tools-to-identify-病人-at-risk-of-medication-harm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Researchers-develop-tools-to-identify-病人-at-risk-of-medication-harm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28a84623-3da5-4652-b2dd-4e74b1c704d3 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 08:10:28 -0400 Researchers develop tools to identify patients at risk of medication harm
沉默两个基因可以使癌细胞接受化疗伦敦玛丽女王大学的科学家发现了两种导致头颈癌患者对化疗产生抗药性的新基因，而沉默其中任何一个基因都可以使之前对化疗无反应的癌细胞随后对其产生反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Silencing-two-genes-can-make-cancer-cells-receptive-to-chemotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Silencing-two-genes-can-make-cancer-cells-receptive-to-chemotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c4ef105-b9fe-4c2c-a427-a2178c271018 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 08:03:00 -0400 Silencing two genes can make cancer cells receptive to chemotherapy
冠状病毒融合肽可能成为疫苗开发的重要靶点尽管 COVID-19 大流行是大多数人类第一次了解到这种现在臭名昭著的疾病，但冠状病毒家族是在 20 世纪 60 年代中期首次被发现的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Coronavirus-fusion-peptide-could-be-important-target-for-vaccine-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Coronavirus-fusion-peptide-could-be-important-target-for-vaccine-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f2b9f2b-9909-4ab5-a589-9fb733a67b25 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 07:52:35 -0400 Coronavirus fusion peptide could be important target for vaccine development
RSV 对某些人可能会危及生命：研究每年，呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 在全球范围内引起无数呼吸道感染。对于婴儿、幼儿和患有基础疾病的人来说，该病毒可能会危及生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/RSV-can-be-life-throne-for-some-people-Study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/RSV-can-be-life-throne-for-some-people-Study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2f6d545-e84c-442d-a956-df99de2d67a7 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 07:39:57 -0400 RSV can be life-threatening for some people: Study
首个针对乳糖不耐受的护理点基因测试：紧凑的实验室电话诊断检测紧凑的诊断测定的性能可以准确、快速地诊断乳糖不耐受。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/The-first-point-of-care-genic-test-for-lactose-intolerance-A-compact-lab-on-phone-diagnostic-assay。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/The-first-point-of-care-genic-test-for-lactose-intolerance-A-compact-lab-on-phone-diagnostic-assay。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26e290ba-36a2-475c-bcab-f6c232129c5f Mon, 04 Sep 2023 07:36:00 -0400 The first point-of-care genetic test for lactose intolerance: A compact, lab-on-phone diagnostic assay
研究发现 ChatGPT 可以揭穿疫苗神话并提高疫苗接种率发表在同行评审期刊《人类疫苗和免疫治疗》上的一项研究的作者表示，ChatGPT 可以通过揭穿有关疫苗安全性的神话来帮助提高疫苗的使用率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/ChatGPT-can-debunk-vaccine-myths-and-increase-vaccine-uptake-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/ChatGPT-can-debunk-vaccine-myths-and-increase-vaccine-uptake-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92a80dab-f58e-4942-af68-b9b8d6d97d66 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 07:26:02 -0400 ChatGPT can debunk vaccine myths and increase vaccine uptake, study finds
霉菌毒素污染仍然是一个严重的食品/饲料安全问题霉菌毒素发生和共存的最新证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Mycotoxin-contamination-is-still-a-serious-foodfeed-safety-issue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Mycotoxin-contamination-is-still-a-serious-foodfeed-safety-issue.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4eba8c0a-b8e1-4bec-9043-bfd8834da5c0 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 06:41:00 -0400 Mycotoxin contamination is still a serious food/feed safety issue
大金枪鱼和自动缓冲液交换：Unchained Labs 采访在本次采访中，AZoNetwork 与 Unchained Labs 工作流营销高级总监 Joe Barco 讨论了与 Big Tuna 进行自动缓冲区交换的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Big-Tuna-and-automated-buffer-exchange-An-interview-with-Unchained-Labs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Big-Tuna-and-automated-buffer-exchange-An-interview-with-Unchained-Labs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb74c038-2bfc-4a3e-9cbf-d95926359de8 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 06:27:00 -0400 Big Tuna and automated buffer exchange: An interview with Unchained Labs
生命早期接触高果糖与青少年焦虑症患病率增加有关研究人员调查了生命早期接触高果糖是否直接影响小胶质细胞的基本功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Early-life-high-fructose-exposure-is-linked-with-increased-prevalence-of-adolescent-anxiety-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Early-life-high-fructose-exposure-is-linked-with-increased-prevalence-of-adolescent-anxiety-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b0dbbb2-7a44-4533-899c-22bd8ea776c5 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 04:47:00 -0400 Early life high fructose exposure is associated with increased prevalence of adolescent anxiety disorders
